body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Kenneth Phillips and the customer's name is Deborah Sanchez.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Kenneth Phillips, and I am with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, I'm Deborah Sanchez. I'm looking for some information about your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Deborah! What specific information are you looking for? Are you interested in a particular model?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm actually not sure yet. I just want to see my options. Also, I need to know about financing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely! We have a wide range of models available. Before we dive in, could you please provide me with your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one zero one zero two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! That helps a lot. Lastly, could you confirm your date of birth for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it is March fourth, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Deborah! Now, let's go over some of our most popular models and their financing options.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sounds good! I appreciate your help, Kenneth.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your time today, Deborah. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
